attributes.action: Introduce legislation to make it illegal for our consular staff overseas to use taxpayer pounds to help drunken Brits overseas.
attributes.additional_details: It is a gross immorality for taxpayer pounds to be wasted on helping Brits who get arrested overseas because of what they did when they were drunk.  Drunkenness is self inflicted and consular staff must legally be prevented from using taxpayer pounds to help those who bring these problems on themselves.
